text: Gudakkarai is a panchayat village in Gobichettipalayam taluk in Erode District of Tamil Nadu state, India. It is about 28 km from Gobichettipalayam and 63 km from district headquarters Erode. The village is located on the road connecting Gobichettipalayam with Punjai Puliampatti. Gudakkarai has a population of about 3289. ==References== Category:Villages in Erode district
title: Gudakkarai
